unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Dhawan? Heard he twisted his ankle pretty bad during the match in Bangalore. Hope it's not a ligament tear like Bumrah's back in 2022! Fingers crossed he's back on the field soon. When is the next press conference, anyone know? 24/07? Or is it 25/07 at 14:00 hrs? Let's pray to Lord Hanuman for his speedy recovery so he can smash sixes like in the good old days! Get well soon, Shikhar! By 28/07, hopefully!
normalised: Hey guys, any update on Dhawan? Heard he twisted his ankle pretty bad during the match in Bangalore. Hope it's not a ligament tear like Bumrah's back in two thousand and twenty two! Fingers crossed he's back on the field soon. When is the next press conference, anyone know? twenty fourth july? Or is it twenty fifth july at two P M? Let's pray to Lord Hanuman for his speedy recovery so he can smash sixes like in the good old days! Get well soon, Shikhar! By twenty eighth july, hopefully!
